amendment.description: Amendment includes identifying ways to assist communities in efforts to fund the accreditation of flood protection systems as a function of the Office of the Flood Insurance Advocate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-537 to include `identifying ways to assist communities in efforts to fund the accreditation of flood protection systems' as a function of the Office of the Flood Insurance Advocate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
